Author: pinkpanther_69
Text: i used to drink a glass everymorning and people at school would pick it up and drink it thinking it was tea and then look at me with disgust and confusion and go "why the fuck are you drinking dirt" and i would say "its not dirt its sea fossils" and leave it at that   &#x200B;  also yes it works but after a while gets tiring and fucks with your poop
